title: An Open-label, Multicenter, Non-Comparative Phase II Study of the Combination of Intravenous Topotecan and Gemcitabine Administered Once Weekly for Three Weeks Every 28 Days as Second-line Treatment in Patients With Recurrent Platinum Sensitive Ovarian Cancer

operands.value: Have had one prior platinum-based chemotherapy regimen for the treatment of primary disease
At least 4 weeks since last surgery or radiation therapy
Must have had a treatment-free interval of greater than 6 months following response to platinum
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Women of child-bearing potential that do not practice adequate contraception
Received more than one primary chemotherapy regimen

Concomitant or previous malignancies with the exception of adequately treated basal cell or squamous cell skin cancer, in situ cervical cancer, incidental carcinoid, or other cancer from which the patient has been disease free for 5 years
Concurrent severe medical problems unrelated to the malignancy which would limit full compliance with the study
Received radiation to more than 10% of bone
Prior treatment with topotecan or gemcitabine
Hypersensitivity to camptothecin or nucleoside analogues
Use of an investigational agent within 30 days

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('At least 4 weeks since last surgery or radiation therapy'), Symbol('ECOG performance status of 0, 1, or 2'), Symbol('Have had one prior platinum-based chemotherapy regimen for the treatment of primary disease'), Symbol('Must be FEMALE'), Symbol('Must have had a treatment-free interval of greater than 6 months following response to platinum'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Not(Or(Symbol('Active uncontrolled infection requiring antibiotics'), Symbol('Concomitant or previous malignancies with the exception of adequately treated basal cell or squamous cell skin cancer, in situ cervical cancer, incidental carcinoid, or other cancer from which the patient has been disease free for 5 years'), Symbol('Concurrent severe medical problems unrelated to the malignancy which would limit full compliance with the study'), Symbol('Hypersensitivity to camptothecin or nucleoside analogues'), Symbol('Pregnant or lactating'), Symbol('Prior treatment with topotecan or gemcitabine'), Symbol('Received more than one primary chemotherapy regimen'), Symbol('Received radiation to more than 10% of bone'), Symbol('Use of an investigational agent within 30 days'), Symbol('Women of child-bearing potential that do not practice adequate contraception'))))
